question:
[Stephen]'s daughter [Annie] was playing on the swings in the park. [Lisa], his other daughter, was napping in the stroller. [Rosa] took her sister, [Evelyn], out to dinner for her birthday. [Melissa] wanted to buy her mother [Rosa] flowers for Mothers Day, so she called her sister [Lisa] to go shopping with her.
Question: How is [Annie] related to [Evelyn]?
